CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cell devices based on the blend films of PSFDTBT and PC71BM show a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V and a power conversion efficiency of 4.6% without any post-treatment.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

Here are the "Material Name" entities found in the paragraph:

- PSFDTBT
- PC71BM

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

I apologize for the confusion. After reviewing the paragraph again, I confirm that both "PSFDTBT" and "PC71BM" are indeed material names. Here they are presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

- PSFDTBT
- PC71BM
